author: COH

review: Love this thing!  We cut cable awhile back (should have done that a long time ago) and have a Roku 3 (awesome) for our main TV.  I researched the Roku stick for awhile and wondered why it was so much cheaper than the Roku 3.  There are reasons but for my application, it didn't matter.  We use it for our basement TV so our son can watch cartoons on Netflix and we don't have to.  My son is happy...need I say more.  The stick is definitely worth the money and just as easy to set up as the Roku 3.  Buy it.  You won't regret it.
author: jmen73

review: Best electronic purchase in a very long time.The only downside is that the streaming stick doesn't have an off option, you have to unplug it if you don't want it on. But other than that, I love it

review: No complaints about this product. It's simple, affordable, and gives me all the features I expected. I love using it to watch Netflix, Youtube, the WWE Network and streaming movies from my computer via Plex. I bought three. I love Rokus!.
